about_the_game:
Incessant is a first-person survival horror game created to bring you hell on earth. As Dan Wallace, Explore, Run, Hide, and try to survive the butcher... If you can.


An old abandoned building is where Larry Booth, also known as The Butcher dismembers and consumes his victims. There has to be an end to this you must survive Dan.

Features:

* AAA-quality graphics
* Stealth-based gameplay
* Unpredictable Events
* Intense violence and gore

content_descriptors.notes: Incessant contains Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature content that’s not appropriate for all ages.
